00015     // needed for GEANT4 10.3.0 and later
00016 #ifndef aParticleIterator
00017 #define aParticleIterator ((subInstanceManager.offset[g4vpcInstanceID])._aParticleIterator)
00018 #endif
00019 
00020     void GammaPhysics::ConstructProcess() {
00021         aParticleIterator->reset();
00022         while ((*aParticleIterator)()) {
00023             G4ParticleDefinition* particle = aParticleIterator->value();
00024             G4ProcessManager* pmanager = particle->GetProcessManager();
00025             G4String particleName = particle->GetParticleName();
00026             if (particleName == "gamma") {
00027                 pmanager->AddDiscreteProcess(&gammaConvProcess);
00028             }
00029         }
00030     }
00031 
00032 }
